title: Make pccomputerandcommunication.com the primary live link

requirements.text: Make the custom domain `https://pccomputerandcommunication.com` the primary/canonical live link for the website by updating any user-visible references (UI text, links, documentation) that currently point to the IC-provided URL so they instead point to the custom domain, while keeping the IC-provided URL working as an alternate access URL.
acceptanceCriteria: Any user-facing place in the frontend that references the live website URL uses `https://pccomputerandcommunication.com` as the default link.
The custom-domain setup documentation reflects `https://pccomputerandcommunication.com` as the primary URL, while noting the IC-provided URL remains available.
Add a canonical URL hint for search engines by including a `<link rel="canonical" href="https://pccomputerandcommunication.com" />` tag in `frontend/index.html`.
No existing navigation, deep links (hash navigation), or section scrolling behavior is broken by these changes.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing components instead).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`).
Backend remains single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not perform or automate the userâ€™s DNS registrar changes (this remains a manual step outside the app).
Do not attempt to implement HTTP redirects at the boundary node level from the IC-provided domain to the custom domain.
